verbs.description: [V: athens] state university hires firm to look for new president athens state university is hiring a search firm to help it look for its next president the decatur daily reports the university will pay 67 500 to academic search of washington to help recruit the school next president ron ingle university of houston - victoria athens alabama athens state university athens athens state president interim president
